attributes.action: to get rid of homework in secondary school
attributes.additional_details: I've heard and know of people who suffered depression/anxiety which can be a consequence of homework. They both lead can lead to death, which is terrible and there shouldn't be suicide over work. Also stress can lead to bad behavior, attitude, poor grades and anxiety which isn't good at all.
attributes.background: Homework is a thing no child/teen likes and can lead to depression and is always a pain/stress. Majority of my h/w i ask my parents to help me with or google. This is what other children do as well this leads to a low point of us getting homework.
